event.title: Great Western Rails #1 - Siri vs Alexa Ruby Showdown
event.description:
• What we'll do
If you're working with Ruby and/or Rails for work, home or play, Great Western Rails is the perfect place to meet other like-minded folk. We'll have some interesting talks, networking, and snacks/drinks to go around

Jan 16th Schedule:

6:30PM - Doors Open, Food & Drinks
7:00PM - Lightning Talks
8:30PM - Close / Pub

1. "Alexa, ask Cookpad... Fun with an Amazon Echo, Ruby and Recipes" by @tapster
2. "Bringing Ruby Home. Integrating Ruby with HomeKit" by @karlentwistle

• What to bring

• Important to know
